long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Egyptian Platformer! Use the spacebar to jump. Use the "wasd" keys or the arrow keys to move. The longer you press the spacebar, the higher you jump! That's all there is to it! Thank you for downloading!
